chart_metadata.name: navidrome
chart_metadata.description: Navidrome is a personal streaming service

runAsContext.description: Navidrome can run as any non-root user.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Navidrome

attrs.label: Login Screen Welcome Message
attrs.description: The welcome message to display on the Navidrome Login Screen.

attrs.label: Enable Local Playback
attrs.description:
Enable local playback for Navidrome.</br>
This will allow you to play music from your local machine, by mounting</br>
the sound card to the container.</br>
Keep in mind that this will make the container to run with elevated privileges</br>
and privilege escalation. Use with caution.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Navidrome.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Navidrome will run as.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Navidrome will run as.

attrs.label: Web Port
attrs.description: The port for the Navidrome Web UI.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.</br>

attrs.label: Navidrome Data Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Navidrome Data.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.description: Make sure to check the ID value is correct and aligns with RunAs user context of the application

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Navidrome.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Navidrome.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.2.10.app_readme:
Navidrome

Navidrome is a personal streaming service

Additional configuration options can be defined via environment variables. See more information on the Navidrome Documentation
1.2.10.detailed_readme:
Navidrome

Navidrome is a personal streaming service

Additional configuration options can be defined via environment variables. See more information on the Navidrome Documentation
